snippet.title: The Way - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Way is a 2D puzzle platformer game inspired by classic titles like Another World, Heart of Darkness and Flashback.


The Way tells a story about a member of space explorers team, who lost his beloved one and cannot accept her death.
Finding ancient writings on eternal existence during one of his last expeditions makes him come back there in search of the meaning of life itself.

Available now!

STEAM:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/311010

GOG
https://www.gog.com/game/the_way

HUMBLE STORE
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/the-way

Official site:
http://www.thewaygame.com/

Supported by:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1752350052/the-way/
